{{Actor| | type = Script thing | name = Secret trigger | class = SecretTrigger | doomednum = 9046 }}[[Classes]]: SecretTrigger
==Usage== A '''SecretTrigger''' counts as a found [[secret]] when [[activation|activated]]. The secret trigger destroys itself after activation and cannot be reactivated. ===Arguments=== The secret trigger takes one argument, which indicates how the player is told about it: {{TArgs|0}} notification type ::* 0: Message and sound effect ::* 1: Message only ::* 2: Sound effect only ::* 3: Neither message nor sound effect ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SecretTrigger native { +{{Flag|NOBLOCKMAP}} +{{Flag|NOSECTOR}} +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} +{{Flag|DONTSPLASH}} }
